subject: Re: Order #SSN2709, how did it go?
description_text: It came with NO brackets to attach the haptics to the pedals!!!! The web clearly states that the haptics come with two brackets (one for throttle brake and one for clutch). How is it possible. How can i use it with no brackets?!?! I bought both the pedals and the haptics in the same order. This is unbelievable!!! El 9 oct 2025, a la(s) 4:33 p. m., SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió: ﻿ Hello Juan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Juan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.
